mdRecord.dcterms:title: John Galen Howard House, exterior
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Howard, John Galen (American architect, 1864-1931) [work]
wilson, richard Guy [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Detail view of upper floor balcony

Designed in an "L" shape to follow the lot line, this long, horizontal, shingled house shows the degree to which the style of an eastern establishment architect [John Galen Howard] was influenced by western informality. http://www.verlang.com/sfbay0004ref_20thc_010.html#1401_LeRoy [work]

shingle
